pages.text: By filling up a $(item)chest/$ entirely with items that you want to be filtered (or placeholders), an $(item)andesite funnel/$ will not be able to insert items, causing them to move past it.$(p)While this is still a manual solution, which won't even work if you try to automatically empty the filtering chest, it$(br)is still useful early on, for example when $(l:renewables/03_gravel)milling gravel/$.

pages.title: Andesite Funnel
pages.text: Later on, $(item)brass funnels/$ will be able to filter items properly.
